Debug Log.description: Logs message to the Unity Console.

Debug Log Error.description: A variant of Debug.Log that logs an error message to the console.

Debug Log Warning.description: A variant of Debug.Log that logs a warning message to the console.

Debug Log Exception.description: A variant of Debug.Log that logs an error message from an exception to the console.

Debug LogFormat.description: Logs a formatted message to the Unity Console.

Debug LogErrorFormat.description: Logs a formatted error message to the Unity console.

Debug LogWarningFormat.description: Logs a formatted warning message to the Unity Console.

Debug DrawLine.description: Draws a line between specified start and end points.
Debug DrawLine.body: Debug.DrawLine(Vector3 start$1, Vector3 end$2, Color color = Color.white$3, float duration = 0.0f$4, bool depthTest = true$5);

Debug DrawRay.description: Draws a line from start to start + dir in world coordinates.
Debug DrawRay.body: Debug.DrawRay(Vector3 start$1, Vector3 dir$2, Color color = Color.white$3, float duration = 0.0f$4, bool depthTest = true$5);
